oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Thomas Postell Campbell at Hardeman Courthouse
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of Thomas Postell Campbell (1851-1948) sitting on the steps of the Hardeman County courthouse. He was the mayor and City Recorder of Bolivar for many years. Later, he became a Justice of the Peace and a member of the Hardeman County court for 47 years. Note: this negative is only partially exposed and was cut in half.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Men; Courthouses
